ability.name: Piercing Arrow
ability.description: Varus charges and fires an arrow, dealing damage to all enemies in a line. Damage : 300 / 550 / 800

ability.name: Spider Form
ability.description: Elise summons Spiderlings and transforms, gaining Lifesteal. Lifesteal : 60% / 90% / 120%. Num Spiderlings : 1 / 2 / 4. Spiderling Attack Damage : 60

ability.name: Soul Shackles
ability.description: Morgana fires chains to nearby enemies, dealing damage and stunning after a short delay if they are still nearby. Damage : 175 / 300 / 425. Stun Duration : 2 / 4 / 6

ability.name: Last Caress
ability.description: Evelynn deals damage to the 3 closest enemies and teleports away. Damage is increased against low health enemies. Damage : 200 / 300 / 400. Damage Multiplier : 300% / 400% / 500%. Execute threshold : 50%

ability.name: The Darkin Blade
ability.description: Aatrox cleaves the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemies inside it. Spell Damage : 300 / 600 / 900

ability.name: Pyroclasm
ability.description: Brand launches a bouncing fireball, damaging enemies hit. Damage : 250 / 450 / 650. Max Bounces : 4 / 6 / 20

ability.name: Demonflare
ability.description: Swain transforms, draining health from all nearby enemies. At the end of his transformation, Swain sends out a burst of energy dealing damage to nearby enemies. Damage Per Tick : 40 / 80 / 120. Heal per Tick : 30 / 60 / 90. Soul Flare Damage : 300 / 600 / 900

ability.name: Dragon's Decent
ability.description: Shyvana dashes and transforms, gaining Attack Damage and Attack Range. When transformed, her attacks set enemies on fire. Damage : 200 / 300 / 400. Attack Damage while Dragon : 100 / 150 / 200

ability.name: Voice of Light
ability.description: Aurelion Sol breathes a large blast of fire in a line, dealing damage to enemies. Damage : 250 / 500 / 750

ability.name: Grand Starfall
ability.description: Pantheon leaps in the air, crashing down towards the farthest enemy, stunning them. Enemies in Pantheon's path take % of their Maximum Health as Magic Damage. They then burn for an additional 20% of their Maximum Health as True Damage over 10 seconds. Applies Grievous Wounds. Stun Duration : 2 / 2 / 2. Damage : 10% / 20% / 30%

ability.name: Tempest Steel
ability.description: Yasuo stabs forward, damaging two enemies in a line. On third cast, Yasuo instead launches a tornado dealing damage and knocking up enemies in a line for 1.5s. Applies on hit effects. Damage : 150 / 350 / 550

ability.name: Unbreakable
ability.description: Braum gains a barrier that blocks incoming damage. Damage Reduction : 70% / 80% / 90%

ability.name: Frozen Tomb
ability.description: Lissandra encases the target in ice for 1.5s, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Below half HP, Lissandra instead encases herself, becoming untargetable for 2s. Damage : 175 / 325 / 475

ability.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
ability.description: Ashe fires an arrow that stuns and damages the farthest enemy. The stun is longer the farther the enemy. Damage : 200 / 400 / 600. Stun Duration : 1 / 1.5 / 2

ability.name: Thunder Claws
ability.description: Volibear empowers his attacks to chain between enemies, applying on-hit effects. Max Bounces : 2 / 3 / 4. Chain Attack Damage Multiplier : 0.8 / 0.9 / 1

ability.name: Glacial Prison
ability.description: Sejuani creates a large glacial storm, stunning enemies within it after a short delay. Damage : 100 / 175 / 250. Stun Duration : 2 / 3.5 / 5

ability.name: Glacial Storm
ability.description: Anivia channels a large hailstorm, damaging and slowing the attack speed of enemies inside of it. Total Damage : 800 / 950 / 1200. Storm Duration : 6s

ability.name: Rocket Grab
ability.description: Blitzcrank pulls the furthest enemy to him and stuns them for 2.5s. Damage : 250 / 550 / 850

ability.name: Decimate
ability.description: Darius swings his axe, damaging nearby enemies and healing himself based off enemies hit. Damage : 150 / 200 / 250. Heal : 100 / 150 / 200

ability.name: Deadly Lotus
ability.description: Katarina channels for 2.5s and fires daggers at a number of nearby enemies, dealing damage and reducing healing. Damage : 45 / 70 / 95

ability.name: Spinning Axes
ability.description: Draven gains Spinning Axes, dealing bonus on-hit damage. Stacks up to two times. Attack Damage Scaling : 1.5 / 2 / 2.5

ability.name: Riposte
ability.description: Fiora becomes immune to damage and spells. After a short delay, she stuns and damages the closest enemy Damage : 100 / 250 / 400

ability.name: Judgement
ability.description: Garen spins his sword around for 4s, becoming immune to magic damage and dealing damage to nearby enemies. Damage per Tick : 40 / 65 / 90

ability.name: Silver Bolts
ability.description: Innate: Vayne deals bonus true damage every third attack based on the enemy's maximum health. Percentage Damage : 8% / 12% / 16%

ability.name: Relentless Pursuit
ability.description: Lucian dashes away to safety and attacks an enemy twice, once with Attack Damage and once with Spell Damage. Ability Damage : 125 / 250 / 375

ability.name: SOlar Flare
ability.description: Leona calls down a solar ray that damages and slows enemies inside it. The enemy in the center is stunned. Damage : 175 / 250 / 325. Duration : 5 / 7 / 9

ability.name: Divine Judgement
ability.description: Kayle shields the weakest ally, making them immune to damage. Damage : 500 / 800 / 1100. Duration : 2 / 2.5 / 3. Extra Targets : 0 / 1 / 2

ability.name: Spirit's Refuge
ability.description: Shen creates a zone around himself, allowing allies to dodge all attacks. Duration : 3 / 4 / 5

ability.name: Razor Shuriken
ability.description: Zed throws a shuriken, dealing damage to enemies in a line. Damage : 200 / 350 / 500

ability.name: Slicing Maelstrom
ability.description: Kennen summons a storm around him, dealing damage and stunning enemies inside of it for 1.5s. Damage : 225 / 450 / 675

ability.name: Five Point Strike
ability.description: Akali throws shurikens in front of her, dealing damage. This spell can critically strike. Damage : 200 / 350 / 500

ability.name: Buckshot
ability.description: Innate: Graves' attacks deal increased damage and hit all enemies in front of him. Bonus Damage : 5% / 10% / 15%

ability.name: Phantom Underlow
ability.description: Pyke dashes behind the furthest enemy, creating an afterimage that stuns enemies it passes through. Damage : 150 / 200 / 250. Stun Duration : 1.5 / 2 / 2.5

ability.name: Wild Cards
ability.description: Twisted Fate throws a card that either stuns, deals damage around his target, or restores mana to himself and nearby allies. Damage : 150 / 250 / 350. Stun Duration : 2 / 3 / 4. Mana Restore : 30 / 50 / 70

ability.name: Powder Kegs
ability.description: Gangplank periodically creates barrels. On cast, Gangplank detonates the barrels, damaging nearby enemies. Applies on hit effects. Damage : 150 / 250 / 350

ability.name: Bullet Time
ability.description: Miss Fortune channels for 3s, firing several waves of bullets damaging enemies in a cone. Total Damage : 1300 / 2000 / 2700

ability.name: Obliterate
ability.description: Mordekaiser slams his mace in front him, dealing damage to two enemies in a line. Damage : 250 / 500 / 750

ability.name: Lamb's Respite
ability.description: Kindred creates a zone around herself that prevents allies from dying. Duration : 3 / 4 / 5. Minimum Health : 300 / 600 / 900

ability.name: Requiem
ability.description: Karthus deals damage to a number of random enemies after a long channel. Damage : 350 / 600 / 850. Number of Targets : 5 / 9 / 13

ability.name: Infinite Duress
ability.description: Warwick pounces onto the lowest health enemy, stunning them for 1.5s, damaging them and healing himself. Applies on-hit effects. Damage : 150 / 225 / 300

ability.name: Primal Surge
ability.description: Nidalee heals herself and the weakest ally, then transforms gaining Attack Damage. Heal : 150 / 375 / 600. Transform Attack Damage : 20 / 70 / 120

ability.name: Orb of Deception
ability.description: Ahri fires an orb in a line that returns to her, damaging enemies it passes through. Damage : 100 / 200 / 300

ability.name: Savagery
ability.description: Rengar leaps to the lowest health enemy and stabs them for bonus on-hit damage. After dealing damage, Rengar gains Attack Speed and 25% Critical Strike Chance. Attack Damage Scaling : 200% / 300% / 400%. Attack Speed : 30% / 50% / 70%

ability.name: GNAR!
ability.description: Gnar transforms, gaining Health, Attack Damage and jumping behind the furthest enemy, damaging and stunning enemies nearby for 2s. Damage : 200 / 300 / 400. Transform Health : 250 / 450 / 650. Transform Attack Damage : 50 / 100 / 150

ability.name: Taste their Fear
ability.description: Kha'Zix slashes the closest enemy, dealing bonus damage to enemies that are alone. Damage : 150 / 250 / 350. Isolation Damage : 400 / 600 / 800

ability.name: Nether Blade
ability.description: Kassadin's attacks steal mana from enemies, converting it into a shield that lasts for 4s. Shield Amount : 25 / 50 / 75

ability.name: Burrow
ability.description: Rek'Sai burrows for a short duration becoming untargetable and healing. When Rek'Sai unburrows she deals damage and knocks up the closest enemy for 1.75s. Heal : 150 / 300 / 450. Damage : 200 / 350 / 500

ability.name: Rupture
ability.description: Cho'gath ruptures an area, stunning and damaging enemies inside of it. Damage : 200 / 400 / 600. Knockup Duration : 1.5 / 1.75 / 2

ability.name: Killer Instinct
ability.description: Kai'Sa dashes to the farthest enemy unit, gaining a damage shield and Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Attack Speed : 50% / 75% / 100%. Shield Amount : 400 / 700 / 1000

ability.name: Explosive Charge
ability.description: Tristana places a bomb on her current target that detonates after 3 attacks, damaging nearby enemies. Damage : 70 / 110 / 150. Explosive Charge Damage : 150 - 300

ability.name: Wild Growth
ability.description: Lulu grants an ally bonus Health, knocking up enemies near them for 1.25s. Bonus Health : 300 / 400 / 500. Extra Targets : 0 / 1 / 2

ability.name: Keeper's Verdict
ability.description: Poppy swings her hammer, damaging and knocking up the closest enemy. Damage : 300 / 500 / 700. Stun Duration : 2 / 3 / 4. Number of Targets : 1 / 2 / 3

ability.name: Primordial Burst
ability.description: Veigar blasts an enemy with magical energy, dealing damage. This spell instantly kills if the enemy is a lower star level than Veigar. Damage : 350 / 650 / 950

ability.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
ability.description: Camille singles out an enemy, dealing magic damage and rooting them. Camille's allies in range will prioritize attacking that enemy. Damage : 200 / 325 / 450. Rooting duration : 4 / 5 / 6

ability.name: Mercury Cannon
ability.description: Jayce knocks away an emeny in melee range, dealing damage and stunning them for few seconds. He then transforms his hammer into a cannon, increasing his attack range by 3 hexes and gaining max attackspeed for few attacks. Damage : 200 / 350 / 500. Stun Duration : 2.5 / 4.25 / 6. Attacks : 3 / 5 / 7

ability.name: Assault and Battery
ability.description: Vi charges down the furthest enemy, knocking aside anyone in her way. When she reaches her target, she deals magic damage and knocks them up. Other enemies knocked aside take the same damage. Damage : 300 / 500 / 700. Stun Duration : 2 / 2.5 / 3

ability.name: Get Excited
ability.description: Jinx gets excited as participates in kills: On her first takedown, she gains attack speed. On her second, she swaps to her rocket launcher causing her attacks to deal bonus area damage. Attack Speed : 60% / 80% / 100%. Damage : 100 / 200 / 300

items.name: Archangels Staff
items.description: In combat, gain 20 Ability Power every 5 seconds

items.name: Redemption
items.description: Heal adjacent allies for 12% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 5% less multi-target damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

items.name: Hand of Justice
items.description: Grants 2 effects: +15 Attack Damage and 15% Ability Power, Attacks and Abilities heal for 15% of damage dealt. Each round, randomly increase 1 of these effects by 30%.

items.name: Blue Buff
items.description: Grant 10 bonus starting Mana, Gain 20 Mana after casting an Ability [Only 1 per Champion]

items.name: Statik Shyv
items.description: Grant 15% Attack Speed. Every 3rd attack shocks 4 enemies for 70 magic damage and reduces their Maigc Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

items.name: Frozen Heart
items.description: Reduce the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 25% [Only 1 per Champion]

items.name: Chalice of Power
items.description: Grant 30 Ability Power to the holder and 2 adjacent allies in the same row.

items.name: Spear of Shojin
items.description: Attacks restore 8 additional Mana

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.description: Damage heals the holder for 25% of damage dealt. Gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds, when at 40% Health

items.name: Deathblade
items.description: Grant 40/60/80 bonus Attack Damage (including components)

items.name: Infinity Edge
items.description: Grant 75% Critical Strike Chance and 10 Critical Strike Damage. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage. [Only 1 per Champion]

items.name: Giant Slayer
items.description: Abilities and attacks deal 20% more damage. If the target has more than 2200 maximum Health, deal 45% more damage.

items.name: Hextech Gunblade
items.description: Damage heals the holder, and the lowest Health ally, for 25% of the damage dealt.

items.name: Edge of Night
items.description: At 50% Health, the holder briefly becomes untargetable and sheds negative effects. Then they gain 30% bonus Attack Speed. [Only 1 per Champion]

items.name: Zekes Herald
items.description: Grant 30% Attack Speed to the holder and 2 adjacent allies in the same row.

items.name: Guinsoos Rageblade
items.description: Attacks grant 6% bonus Attack Speed. This effect stacks!

items.name: Last Whisper
items.description: Dealing physical damage reduces the target's Armor by 50% for 5 seconds. The effect does not stack. [Only 1 per Champion]

items.name: Rapidfire Cannon
items.description: Grant 40% bonus Attack Speed (including components) and 1 Attack Range. Attacks cannot miss.

items.name: Runaans Hurricane
items.description: Grant 10 bonus Attack Damage. Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 70% of the holder's Attack Damage ad physical damage.

items.name: Zzrot Portal
items.description: Taunt the enemies within 4 hexes. On death, a Voidspawn arises, taunting nearby enemies. Voidspawns from summoned units are 25% effective.

items.name: Banshees Claw
items.description: Grant a shield to the holder and 2 adjacent allies in the same row. It blocks the first enemy Ability, up to 600 damage.

items.name: Morellonomicon
items.description: Grant 30 bonus Ability Power. Magic or true damage from an Ability burns the holder's target, dealing 25% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn. [Only 1 per Champion]

items.name: Sunfire Cape
items.description: Every 2 seconds, an enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 10% of their maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%. [Only 1 per Champion]

items.name: Warmogs Armor
items.description: Grants 1000 bonus Health (including components)

items.name: Zephyr
items.description: Summon a whirlwind at combat start on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds. [Only 1 per Champion]

items.name: Dragons Claw
items.description: Grants 120 bonus Magic Resist (including components). Regenerate 1.2% maximum Health for each enemy targeting the holder every 2 seconds. If the holder is a Dragon, increase all bonuses and effects by 20%

items.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
items.description: Gain 18 Armor and Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

items.name: Ionic Spark
items.description: Enemies within 3 hexes take 50% reduced Magic Resist. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped for magic damage equal to 250% of their maximum Mana.

items.name: Quicksilver
items.description: Grant 20% Attack Speed. Become immune to crowd control for 15 seconds at combat start. [Only 1 per Champion]

items.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
items.description: Grant 40% bonus Critical Strike Damage and 40 bonus Ability Power. Magic and true damage from an Ability can critically strike. [Only 1 per Champion]

items.name: Shroud of Stillness
items.description: At the start of combat, shoot a beam vertically that delays the first cast of affected enemies by 35%

items.name: Thiefs Gloves
items.description: Each round, equip 2 random items. [Consumes all item slots on a Champion]

items.name: Bramble Vest
items.description: Grants 80 bonus Armor (including components). Negates 75% bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by an attack, deal 75/100/150 magic damage to all nearby enemies(once every 2.5 seconds).

items.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
items.description: At the start of combat, shield the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row for 300/350/400 over 15 seconds.

items.name: Rabadons Deathcap
items.description: Grant 75 bonus Ability Power (including components).
